H0.text: March 21 is the date on which North America usually experiences the longest period of daylight.

H1.text: June 21 is the date on which North America usually experiences the longest period of daylight.

H2.text: September 21 is the date on which North America usually experiences the longest period of daylight.

H3.text: December 21 is the date on which North America usually experiences the longest period of daylight.

A4.text: the summer solstice is the day with the longest period of daylight

A5.text: The summer solstice occurs during the hemisphere's summer
